column1: Report Generated October 11, 2011 (modified 10/28/2011 to remove duplicate records)
Notes:  Data shown are subject to change.  The data may be audited and where certain errors are discovered, mechanisms are available to allow revisions.
Additional facility-specific data reports are available here: https://ghgreport.arb.ca.gov/eats/carb/
Note: Most reports have yet to undergo third party verification and the status of their current reporting is displayed in the data columns.
* Emissions from out-of-state power plants have been scaled to reflect the fraction of electricity actually delivered to California (0.01609 for PacifiCorp, 0.0661 for Sierra Pacific Power).
These out-of-state facilities are displayed in italics.
